game.name: Goal Keeper
game.description:
The goalkeeper is undoubtedly one of the most crucial positions in every football team. He is determined to stop his rival team from scoring and turn the tide into the favour of the team. In this brand new sports game, you have decided to play the role of a goalkeeper on the recommendation of your friends. You have accepted this offer and look happy to join Goal Keeper game. We are quite confident that you have the ability to address all the balls from the free-kick with your gloves.
Your primary objective in this cool soccer game is to defend all the goals made by the players on the other team. Try to defend as many ball as you can to hit the maximum score on the board! Make sure to focus on the screen all the time to avoid missing any ball. Your opponent will keep throwing balls on you to encourage make any mistake. It is time to show them that you do not have any mercy against the balls in this cool html5 football game. 
Put your soccer and focus skills to test to guard the goal and make your team feel proud on you! Remember that your efforts will also get appreciated by the audience siting behind you in this soccer ball game. This awesome free kicks challenge will allow you to be a star goalkeeper of your area. Common friends! Do not let your friends down as they have chosen you to save the most important shot that can help lead their team towards the victory! Use your both hands and legs to save different shots on goal! Good luck to try more top goalkeeper games for free on atmegame.com!
